item.title: BOJ-1874-스택 수열[스택]
item.description: BOJ-1874-스택 수열 문제 바로가기 1874 스택 수열 Before, 실패하는 코드 def stack_sequence(input_value_n: str, input_value_numbers: str) -> None: n = int(input_value_n) numbers = list(map(int, input_value_numbers.split())) stack = [] number = 0 next_number = 0 r = [] ans = [] for i in range(n): pivot = numbers[i] if number < pivot: while number < pivot: number += 1 if next_number <= number: stack.append(number) ans.append('+') next_number = number + 1 elif number > pivot: while number > pivot + 1: number -= 1 ans.
